bibl.title: Papyrology: A Discipline in Flux
Aporemata – Disciplining Classics- Altertumswissenschaft als Beruf, ed. by G. W. Most
bibl.author: HANSON, Ann Ellis

bibl.note: History and methodology of the discipline. - I. The First Generation. - II. Organizing the Documents. - III. Papyri in the Latter-days. - IV. Ameliorations to the Text.
HANSON Ann Ellis, Papyrology: A Discipline in Flux.
Glenn W. MOST (Ed.), Disciplining Classics - Altertumswissenschaft als Beruf = Aporemata. Kritische Studien zur Philologiegeschichte. 6 (Göttingen, 2002) pp. 191-206.
